availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Kentucky on November 5, 1827. Married Tempey A. Brown on April 16, 1845 in Caldwell County. Worked as a farmer in 1850 .Served in the Kentucky State Legislature from Fulton County. Died in Crittenden County, Kentucky on May 18, 1909.

bibl.p: C. Y. Wilson, Ninth Biennial Report from the Bureau of Agriculture, Labor and Statistics of the State of Kentucky, (Frankfort: Capital Office, 1891), 157; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 247; Find A Grave, "William Barnett McConnell (November 5, 1827 - May 18, 1909)," Memorial #18493573 https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=18493573 (accessed June 26, 2017).
